name: MEC Formula Book Bag - Unisex
description:
This much-loved MEC Bookbag has a fresh look and more durable fabric. Dedicated spots for your laptop, books and academic supplies are still in the equation, but we added a heritage logo, a tablet sleeve and better organization for your electronics. The slim side pocket holds a water bottle or vacuum flask of caffeinated motivation.External access padded laptop compartment.Large main compartment holds lots of books and binders.Secondary compartment has a fleece lined tablet sleeve, plus organizer pockets for mouse, power cord, pens and small stuff.Front zippered pocket has a clip.Padded shoulder straps and breathable air mesh foam on back panel.Low-profile webbing handle is folded and stitched for comfort.Designed for school, but can be called into service for day hikes too.

        Sustainability
